attributes.description: This dashboard provides visibility into the JVM performance metrics for Kafka brokers.

params.markdown:
### JVM 

This dashboard provides visibility into the JVM runtime environment powering Kafka.

- Tracks JVM uptime, version details, loaded classes, and active thread counts.  
- Monitors heap and non-heap memory usage, memory pools, and buffer pools.  
- Provides garbage collection activity and time spent in GC.  
- Highlights memory indicators like heap usage percentage, pending finalisations, and memory pool peak usage.
